parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Map </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the map grid position of an object or position.<br>
The format is determined by the Grid format specified in the CfgWorlds for the current world. Eg: "024577" or "De82" or similar. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[mapGridPosition]] param </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> param: [[Object]] or [[Position]] - determines reference position </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - grid position </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_gridPos = [[mapGridPosition]] [[player]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_gridPos = [[mapGridPosition]] [[getPos]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[BIS_fnc_gridToPos]], [[BIS_fnc_posToGrid]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
